item.title: Missing "richrig" "SGTech1" packages
item.author: invalid@example.com (rawestall)
item.dc:creator: rawestall
item.content:encoded:
Recently downloaded and installed two maps for UT g.o.t.y and neither would play, first is missing "richrig" package, second is missing "SGTech1" package. Need help finding a link to these missing packages.
Thanks
rawestall

item.content:encoded:
hi
i made one loop animation in 3dstudio max . so i exported animaiton in
ut animation browser through actor x plugin (.psk and .psa ) . i want that how that animation goes to in ut level maps

item.title: DM-Perdition map 'tidier'
item.author: invalid@example.com (R3plicant)
item.dc:creator: R3plicant
item.content:encoded:
Hi all, I have a map I've built with what little knowledge I have, (with substantial help from http://www.unrealwiki.com )and would be VERY honoured if there's a good map-builder out there who'd like to take 50% of the credit for building the map, for optimising it, adjusting the playabilty, lighting, sorting out possible BSP problems and bot pathing as I do not feel up to doing these tasks.
I'd like someone who's not overly busy and would like to take this on.
You'll get 50%...

DM-Perdition map 'tidier'

item.title: How do i add vehicles in DM maps?
item.author: invalid@example.com (THEXFILES)
item.dc:creator: THEXFILES
item.content:encoded: i have 5 maps i made , i would like to redo them and add vehicles in them, the maps are big so there is alot of room for them, if you have played dm-shok-backyard2k4 it is a dm map with onslaught vehicles in it and its pretty cool.Thats what i would like to do in my maps, is there a tutorial page for this? or if someone could help me out on this one...would be great- thanks

item.title: Instant death problem (newbie)
item.author: invalid@example.com (bitman)
item.dc:creator: bitman
item.content:encoded: Hey, Just to start I admit I'm a newbie so the following question may sound a little stupid. I've been trying to make basic maps with UnrealEd, I thin its up to date etc. My problem is that all my players are instantly being killed upon insertion into my level? This is the same for bots and real players. Any Ideas? I Have no idea whats going on!!!
